Walleys quarry emitted 202ugm3.  A mere 40 times higher.

Could you help us to monitor Devon's last breeding lapwings?

What - 2-3hr survey per week, times to suit you
Where - RSPB Exminster & Powderham marshes
When - Breeding season (mid-April to mid-July)
How - Contact Assistant Warden Mark at mark.crisp@rspb.org.uk or 07718 972298 https://t.co/m9RWUrvJfA
